pr_title: Fix link in javadoc to accumulators

timeline.message: Fix link in javadoc to accumulators

timeline.bodyText: Why the specific version of Spark is used here and not just "latest"?
timeline.author: aromanenko-dev
timeline.diffHunk: @@ -37,7 +37,7 @@ * For resilience, {@link AccumulatorV2 Accumulators} are required to be wrapped in a Singleton. * * @see accumulatorsV2 + * href="https://spark.apache.org/docs/2.4.4/streaming-programming-guide.html#accumulators-broadcast-variables-and-checkpoints">accumulatorsV2

replies.bodyText: to be in sync with the version of spark we use. With "latest" if a new spark version comes out and we don't upgrade, then the javadoc is out of sync
replies.author: echauchot

replies.bodyText: Ok, so we have not to forget to update these links once Spark deps version will be changed.
replies.author: aromanenko-dev
